cast.overview: Based on the true story of Robin, a handsome, brilliant and adventurous man whose life takes a dramatic turn when polio leaves him paralyzed.
cast.title: Breathe

details.biography: Adam is a native Zimbabwean now living in Cape Town, South Africa. He has been a professional actor for more than 20 years and has a wide range of credits across the crafts of film, theatre and commercial performance. His particular passion is for Shakespeare. His film credits are diverse and he is increasingly known for his character work. He has performed in theatre in Zimbabwe, South Africa, Germany, the UK and the USA.  - IMDb Mini Biography By: Adam Neill
details.name: Adam Neill
